answers.answer: I would see your veterinarian today. Chronic vomiting leads to dehydration which is left untreated can become quite serious. In addition, vomiting leads to pancreatitis, which in time can lead to diabetes and daily insulin injections.In addition, I would stop feeding the puppy food which apparently does not agree with your dog.You might also check the FDA pet food recall list to see if this pet food is tainted or not.The "yellow stuff" is bile from her liver.Dr Carol Osborne, DVM

question: she was normal like every single day... but shes been eating a new food puppy chow.. & today shes throwing up . its really yellow & slimy ...wats happening? im really worried
title: Why is she vomiting?
